content.question: All of the following contributed to the passage of the Eighteenth Amendment legislating Prohibition in 1919 EXCEPT

choices.label: the continued efforts of the Anti-Saloon League
the fervor of the First World War lending patriotism to the cause of prohibition
the Progressive belief in social reform
the cumulative impact of state prohibition laws
the high death toll from alcohol-related automobile accidents

content.answer: the high death toll from alcohol-related automobile accidents

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
